price: फिर जब हम उनसे यातना दूर कर देते, सहसा वे वचन तोड़ देते थे।
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-ʿadhāba idhā hum yankuthūna
